turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello there. I'd like to order a pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let's get that order started.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need four pizzas, small. I need them all to be pepperoni, and can I have extra cheese on all of them, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what did you want to buy?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. you said 4 small pizzas, all pepperoni and with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $43.22 is the total for the order. did you want me to place the order for pick up now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the order has been submitted. it'll be ready for pick up in 35 mins.

items.name: extra cheese on all of them
